text: Košarkaški klub Zdravlje (), commonly referred to as KK Zdravlje, is a men's professional basketball club based in Leskovac, Serbia. ==Home arena== The SRC Dubočica is a multi-purpose indoor arena located in Leskovac and it has a capacity of 3,600 seats. ==Players== ==Coaches== * Boško Đokić * Ivan Tometić (1992–1993) * Jovica Arsić (1999–2003) * Jovica Arsić (2006–2007) * Dragan Arsić (2007–2008) * Saša Jović (2008–2009) * Ivan Zdravković (2012–2013) * Saša Jović (2017–2018) * Dragan Arsić (2018) * Marko Dimitrijević (2018–2019) * Lazar Spasić (2019–present) ==Honours== ;National Cup * Runners-up (1): 1999–00 ==Notable players== * Vukašin Aleksić * Dragan Dojčin * Uroš Lučić * Slobodan Mitić * Miljan Pavković * Saša Stanković ==External links== * KK Zdravlje at srbijasport.net * KK Zdravlje at eurobasket.com Zdravlje Zdravlje Category:Basketball teams established in 1964 Category:Sport in Leskovac
title: KK Zdravlje
